We are convinced that Chrysler has a great future and look forward to more opportunities for our members to share in that success, Bob King said Monday. He also intends to protect teachers from false allegations made by pupils, by allowing them to remain anonymous until charged with an offence. Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept.`` No state needs to declare bankruptcy,'' Bill Lockyer said, The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't. Bill Lockyer 's point-- a valid one-- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments that lack the capacity to repay their debts.
